def count_good_shirt_assignments(heights, mod=1000000008):

    def mul(a, n, mod):
        ans = 1
        while n > 0:
            ans = ans * a % mod
            n -= 1
        return ans
    n = len(heights)
    aa = [(heights[i], i) for i in range(n)]
    aa.append((n + 1, -1))
    aa.sort()
    ans = 1
    l = 0
    r = 1
    while r <= n:
        while aa[r - 1][1] < aa[r][1]:
            r += 1
        ans = ((ans + mul(2, r - l, mod)) % mod - 1 + mod) % mod
        l = r
        r += 1
    return ans
